==Translingual==

===Han character===
{{Han char|rn=195|rad=魚|as=10|sn=21|canj=|four=|ids=⿰魚酒}}

# a kind of clam

====Usage notes====
The codepoint U+4CA4 once both represented ⿰魚酒 (traditional) and ⿰鱼酒 (simplified). Later, it is disunified for compatibility. Now ⿰魚酒 (traditional) belongs to U+9FD0.
